backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor as a placeholder backend entry point with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping implemented features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels for the intro narrative and interactions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference document listing concise human-written summaries of all frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based color tokens, light/dark themes, and base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that switches between the intro narrative flow and the game view based on application state.
frontend/src/content/story.ts: Defines typed story step data and exports the full intro narrative text and structure, including post-slider steps.
frontend/src/features/game/GameView.tsx: Canvas-based 2D game view rendering a scrolling terrain, controllable character, and timed joke speech balloons.
frontend/src/features/game/jokes.ts: Exports a fixed array of five goal-themed jokes used during gameplay.
frontend/src/features/game/SpeechBalloon: UI component that renders an animated speech balloon positioned above the character while staying within canvas bounds.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameLoop.t: Custom React hook that drives a continuous animation loop and updates vertical scroll offset using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/features/game/useKeyboardCo: Custom React hook that tracks arrow-key movement state and triggers a callback when the spacebar is pressed.
frontend/src/features/intro/GoalStickine: Interactive slider component that collects a 1–100% guess, shows conditional feedback, and advances the story after submission.
frontend/src/features/intro/introBackgro: Utility that computes a CSS linear-gradient background which progressively darkens and shifts hues based on the number of story steps marked as darkening.
frontend/src/features/intro/IntroFlow.ts: React component that drives the intro narrative flow, sequencing text, a start button, and a slider interaction with timed transitions, background gradient changes, and a completion callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, switching between anonymous and authenticated actors and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context, provider, and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login/logout, identity persistence, and detailed login status state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens (OKLCH color variables), light/dark themes, base styles, and a custom bounce animation utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and imports global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, scanning sources, extending the theme with OKLCH-based colors, typography, animations, and custom layout utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s narrative-driven goal-setting concept, implemented features, and current state/version of requirements.
